package.name: bas_teleop
package.description:
little_bas teleoperation node, keyboard and joypad
Nodes to republish joystick messages as a cmd_vel topic suitable for use with real or simulated Grizzly.
Small modifications made by Oscar Lima (olima_84@yahoo.com) to adapt the teleop grizzly code to little bas robot.
teleop keyboard node is entirely taken from other source (brsu bonn rhein sieg university of applied sciences germany robocup team)
